content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We power restaurant experiences and help create memories.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bookatable helps diners discover and book great restaurants at anytime, from anywhere.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As you can see, Bookatable has two customers focuses: restaurants and diners. The two go hand in hand as without one the other would not be interested in Bookatable services:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":88995,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/12d44826-6a32-4efb-b6f0-bbc88c97f39f/Capture3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/12d44826-6a32-4efb-b6f0-bbc88c97f39f/Capture3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture3.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"12d44826-6a32-4efb-b6f0-bbc88c97f39f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":731,\"height\":397},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do you know which customer would be a B2B customer and which would be a B2C customer?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
